document.full_text: iceland's most active volcano erupted on saturday and hurled a plume of white smoke far into the air, but experts played down the likelihood it would cause similar disruption to air traffic as a volcano last year.
document.title: iceland volcano erupts, experts play down flight risk
lines_and_colors: iceland's most active volcano erupted on saturday and hurled a plume of white smoke far into the air, but experts played down the likelihood it would cause similar disruption to air traffic as a volcano last year.
